successes.title: Sphericam 2, the 4K 360ยบ Video Camera for VR
successes.description: The perfect 360ยบ camera for Oculus Rift / Google Cardboard. First ever to offer GLOBAL SHUTTER at 60FPS and 4K, 100% spherical capture.

Pledges.description: Thanks for supporting Sphericam 2! We will be sure to loop you in on all campaign progress and updates.
You're an angel who wants to help us realize our dream.
We'll send you a Sphericam-branded "Cardboard" VR headset so that you can enjoy VR video on your own iPhone / Android phone.
